name: Miffy's World
overview: Join the iconic Miffy and perform quests and solve puzzles by exploring Miffy’s World on WiiWare. Your child plays as Miffy, exploring different locales, interacting with characters and objects and accessing a range of fun and educational puzzles. You can also join your child in the fun and take advantage of the multiplayer mode to play alongside your child and give them a bit of help on tricky puzzles and navigation of the gameworld. Aimed at young children, Miffy’s World features the highly stylised art by Dick Bruna that is so familiar to Miffy fans across the globe. The game is very accessible, with easy controls and seamless movements using the Wii Remote and Nunchuk.
